== Elayavoor (CT) (627240) ==

Elayavoor (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 11.53 sq. km. and harbouring 7453 households with total population of 33853 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 3 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 525 km. Male population is 15484 and female population is 18369. Scheduled Caste population is 1268 and Scheduled Tribes population is 62. Census Location Code of the town is 627240<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 67 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 97 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 3 km.
